column1: ACROSS THE ROAD. NUMEROUS TREES WERE SNAPPED. THE TORNADO ENDED AT HIGHWAY 13 A (OHX)

column8: EF1 TORNADO STRUCK THE FAIRGROUNDS AT ZINC PLANT RD. THE PAVILLION WAS DESTROYED. TELEPHONE POLES WERE SNAPPED IN HALF. (OHX)
TRAINED SPOTTER REPORTED TORNADO ON GROUND ON HWY 49. (JAN)
NUMEROUS HARDWOOD TREES SNAPPED AND UPROOTED ALONG THE PATH...WITH THE MOST INTENSE DAMAG
